column4: Short-seller Chanos calls Tesla-SolarCity merger 'crazy': CNBC conference
column5: NEW YORK The prominent short-seller Jim Chanos  founder of Kynikos Associates  on Tuesday called the proposed merger of Tesla Motors Inc  and SolarCity Corp  "crazy " noting that the combined company would need constant access to capital markets.

column4: UPDATE 2-Short-seller Chanos calls Tesla-SolarCity merger 'crazy' -CNBC conference
column5: NEW YORK  Sept 13 The prominent short-seller Jim Chanos  founder of Kynikos Associates  on Tuesday called the proposed merger of Tesla Motors Inc and SolarCity Corp  "crazy " noting that the combined company would need constant access to capital markets.

column4: GM says Bolt EV to have 238-mile range  more than Tesla Model 3
column5: DETROIT General Motors Co said on Tuesday its electric subcompact Chevrolet Bolt EV will have an average range of 238 miles on a full charge  farther than rival Tesla Motors Inc expects for its upcoming Model 3.

column4: UPDATE 2-GM says Bolt EV to have 238-mile range  more than Tesla Model 3
column5: DETROIT  Sept 13 General Motors Co said on Tuesday its electric subcompact Chevrolet Bolt EV will have an average range of 238 miles on a full charge  farther than rival Tesla Motors Inc expects for its upcoming Model 3.

column4: GM says Bolt EV will have 238 miles range  besting Tesla Model 3
column5: DETROIT  Sept 13 General Motors Co on Tuesday announced that its electric subcompact Bolt EV will have an average range of 238 miles on a full charge  farther than Tesla Motors Inc has stated for its upcoming Model 3 range.

column4: Nvidia shows off smaller artificial intelligence computer for Baidu car
column5: U.S. chipmaker Nvidia Corp  showed off on Monday a smaller and more efficient artificial intelligence computer for self-driving cars  saying it would power Baidu's  mapping and autonomous vehicle technology.
